cc_text.paragraph: The Data Grid displays basic data about each search result. You can access more details for a result on its lease detail page. This method is very similar to how one would find contracts and wells, sites details.
The demonstration below describes the steps for viewing more details on a selected lease. Select Play to view the demonstration.
You can access lease details in 3 ways, 1. By right clicking on a row, 2. By clicking on a lease number, 3. By selecting an option in the Lease Information Dropdown List.
Click on a row. Lease details corresponding to the last selected Lease detail option, displays in the Preview Pane if available. In this example the last selected details option was Team.
Now, let’s try the hyperlink option. Click a hyperlinked lease number in the Lease Number column to access details for that lease. The lease’s details display in a new window.
Lease details are organized in tabs.
Click the tab corresponding to the type of information you want to view.

To view the selected lease on a map, click on the View Map button located at the top right of the Lease Information window. This also applies to the Wells/Sites and Contracts tab. In the Wells/Sites tab you can also right-click on a property number and select Map from the context menu.
You can also access a lease’s detail page by selecting one of the options in the Lease Information Dropdown List located on the right side of the Preview Pane Toolbar.
Click on Reports. Reports is displayed in the Lease Information Dropdown List and a list of hyperlinked reports are listed in the Preview Pane.
